body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging           To access this list of accommodations, click on the picture. Greater Cincinnati Convention & Visitors Bureau  Even though no overnight lodging is available at William Howard Taft NHS, there are ample amounts of hotels and bed & breakfasts in the Greater Cincinnati area that visitors can choose from.  From quaint bed & breakfasts to luxury four star hotels, you can find whatever type of overnight accommodation you're looking for in the Greater Cincinnati area.
